modName: Colour Correction FX file for Skyrim
summary:
Do you want that ugly default tone gone? Do you hate that green tint? Well chk this package out and see if works for you!

Be sure to read the description and check out the images.
descriptionHtml:
[SO WHATS CHANGED?]

These Settings give an alternative to the Default Green Skyrim Which imo is unatural looking.

There are 4 versions check description below use which one you like. Although I strongly recommend the Final Version.

-Higher Bloom (not crazy over the top) (ALL VERSIONS)
-Retains Image quality no sharpness or blur change, no grain (ALLVERSIONS)
-Colour tone balanced (FINAL VERSION)
-A clear neutral look (ALL VERSIONS)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

{WHAT YOU NEED TO DO BEFORE PLAYING?]

1. **UNINSTALL PREVIOUS FX MODS** (be sure to back them up)

2. Download the orginal mod pack, install it and replace its fx file with my \'tweaked\' one.
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=174
(USE THE FX FULL PACK)

3. Also make sure in your skryim pref ini (my documents) gamma is set to 1. 

*****make sure you monitor profile setting is on the most balanced colour setting (i.e not too strong in any channels, this way the mod will work better)*****

 (if you have an asus monitor stick it on Theater setting) Mine: Asus VH226
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

/VERSION 1/
Blue Tinted

/VERSION 2/
Red Tinted

/VERSION 3/
more balanced but still slightly blue tint

/VERSION 4/ *FINAL*
Most Colour balanced IMO Reccomend downloading this one first.

(if you can\'t seen the difference between v3 and v4 i suggest staring at the winter comparison shot with the 3 screens. you should be able to tell V4 is slightly less blue with an overal more natural white tone.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[CREDITS]
I\'ve just done some tweaking of the fx file settings all credit for the used file goes to
[rendermax]\' rendermax fine-tuning FX\' 

- and it\'s orginal creators:
Injection method provided by:
[some dude]
-----------------------------
Code added and aranged by:
[some dude]
BeetleatWar1977
[DKT70]
Violator
fpedace
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=238

-Landscape Texture Pack WIP mod
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=329

-all of Xenius\'s (character model improvement mods, click files_
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=726673

-Skyrim Sunglare mod
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=116#content
